name: Gamify WP Plugin
tagline: Reward your Users for interacting with your WordPress site.
body:
Gamify WP is a WordPress Plugin that enables you to award points to your users for interacting with your self-hosted WordPress.org website.  

###Features

- Award Points for Action Hooks added by other plugins

- Assign Point Values for Clicking Links Via Shortcode

- Limit Daily Points Awarded for Actions

- Create Reward Levels and Badges

- Display Detailed Stats to Users

- Create Leaderboards

- Track Site-wide Statistics with Graphs

- No External API/Website Signup Needed

### Author 
John Regan @johnregan3

### Support 

You can find the answer to most of your questions in our Wiki:

[FAQ](https://github.com/johnregan3/gamify-wp-plugin/wiki/FAQ "FAQ")

[Setup](https://github.com/johnregan3/gamify-wp-plugin/wiki/Gamify-WP-Setup "Setup")

[Troubleshooting](https://github.com/johnregan3/gamify-wp-plugin/wiki/Troubleshooting "Troubleshooting")
